thread.title: Re: ‘I am a liberal, and I defend Milo’: Tucker Carlson talks with Milo Yiannopoulos about UC Berkeley riot
thread.title_full: Re: ‘I am a liberal, and I defend Milo’: Tucker Carlson talks with Milo Yiannopoulos about UC Berkeley riot

author: Qui tacet consentit
title: Re: ‘I am a liberal, and I defend Milo’: Tucker Carlson talks with Milo Yiannopoulos about UC Berkeley riot
text:
‘I am a liberal, and I defend Milo’: Tucker Carlson talks with Milo Yiannopoulos about UC Berkeley riot Posted at 10:04 pm on February 2, 2017 by William A. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Thursday night Milo Yiannopoulos made an appearance on “Tucker Carlson Tonight” to discuss the cancellation of his speech at UC Berkeley Wednesday night due to violent protests that evolved into rioting. Programming Note: Milo Yiannopoulos joins @TuckerCarlson to speak out about last night's violent UC Berkeley protests, tonight at 9p ET. pic.twitter.com/TNwydWDtu6 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) February 3, 2017 
Let’s tune in: #MiloYiannopoulos on #UCBerkeley riots: Suddenly there were explosions outside. I was evacuated out of the building -TCT #Tucker @FoxNews 
— Tucker Carlson (@TuckerCarlson) February 3, 2017 #MiloYiannopoulos on #UCBerkeley riots: If you have slightly conservative points of view, you will get called most appalling things. -TCT 
— Tucker Carlson (@TuckerCarlson) February 3, 2017 #MiloYiannopoulos : I have experienced restrictions on my freedom of speech. 
— Tucker Carlson (@TuckerCarlson) February 3, 2017 #Tucker : Has anyone from groups claiming to represent the 1st amendment reached out to help you? #MiloYiannopoulos : Not at all – TCT 
— Tucker Carlson (@TuckerCarlson) February 3, 2017 Milo Yiannopoulos: “I'm not any of the things that these posters characterize me as in an effort to legitimize the violence." #Tucker pic.twitter.com/E9SxW6iHM1 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) February 3, 2017 Trending
